decisions.name: Are_the_Alternate_Contact_fields_completed
decisions.label: Are the Alternate Contact fields completed

decisions.name: is_there_an_adoption_referral_relationship
decisions.label: is there an adoption referral relationship

Flow.description: 1. Allows a user to process an adoption by selecting the adoptee or creating a new contact 2. Checks if animal is desexed and shows a warning if they are not (Only applicable to Dogs, Puppys, Cats, Kittens & Ferrets) 2. Creates a referral and an Animal Referral record.

formulas.description: First Name - Last name of the contact + Adoption
formulas.name: FOR_ReferralName

Flow.label: Animal - Start Adoption

fields.name: This_Animal_is_not_Desexed
fields.fieldText: Warning! {!Get_Animal.animalos__Animal_Name__c} is not desexed - press next to continue with adoption.

fields.name: AlternateContactCompleteContactDetails
fields.fieldText:
Alternate Contact must have 1 Phone Number, an Address, a First Name and an Email address to process an adoption


Please complete any fields visible below. If you do not complete them and press NEXT you will return to this screen to complete them.

﻿

fields.name: CompleteContactDetails
fields.fieldText:
Contact must have 1 Phone Number, an Address, a First Name and an Email address to process an adoption


Please complete any fields visible below. If you do not complete them and press NEXT you will return to this screen to complete them.

﻿

fields.name: ChooseYourPath
fields.fieldText: An existing Adoption Referral was found. To continue the existing referral check the box below

fields.name: noAnimal
fields.fieldText: No Animal record was passed into this flow

fields.name: NoRecordTypeError
fields.fieldText: No RecordType was found

fields.name: dpsErrorMsg
fields.fieldText: No Contact / Alternate Contact Selected, press previous and address

fields.name: dispWelcome
fields.fieldText: This process will create an Adoption record for you and open it after you have selected or created a Contact
